title: [Control systems] Siemens security advisory (AV25-579)
description: On September 9, 2025, Siemens published advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: APOGEE PXC Series (P2 Ethernet)  all versions
Industrial Edge Management OS (IEM-OS)  all versions
SIMATIC Technology Package TPCamGen (6ES7823-0FE30-1AA0)  all versions
SIMATIC Virtualization as a Service (SIVaaS)  all versions
User Management Component (UMC)  versions prior to V2.15.1.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
